scripts.chrome-ui-headedless: npx playwright test --project=chromium-ui && npx playwright show-report
scripts.firefox-ui-headedless: npx playwright test --project=chromium-ui && npx playwright show-report
scripts.webkkit-ui-headedless: npx playwright test --project=chromium-ui && npx playwright show-report
scripts.chrome-ui-headeded: npx playwright test --project=chromium-ui && npx playwright show-report
scripts.firefox-ui-headeded: npx playwright test --project=chromium-ui && npx playwright show-report
scripts.webkkit-ui-headeded: npx playwright test --project=chromium-ui && npx playwright show-report
scripts.exec-all: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
